Nodes.name: Erik
Nodes.text: Ah Mr. Nook. I believe Tortimer told you I'd be coming along. How's it going?

Nodes.name: Erik
Nodes.text: I'm pretty pleased with how this town is laid out. Everything is so close together, not a lot of walking. Perfect.

Nodes.name: Erik
Nodes.text: Well I should probably go catch my afternoon nap.

Nodes.name: Erik
Nodes.text: I do sleep a lot, but if you ever want to pay a visit, my house is just below Raymond's house. Take it easy.
